author: {'steamid': '76561198277315422', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1670008232}
review:
I received this as a gift - nice concept but it gets repetitive rather quickly.
It also crashes all the time, so we'd have to restart all the time (online mode, didn't try offline mode since the dude who gave this to me is living some towns away lol) which is not making it much better.

It also forces you to install .NET core version 3.1.x in order to play which is seemingly ancient, and according to google loses official support by Microsoft very soon (this very month in fact), which is making me feel uncomfortable lol.
I uninstalled both the game and the outdated .NET core it made me install and let the person who gifted this to me know that they may refund this gift if they so desire.

Considering that this is early access, I'd say this game has potential, but as of now it's really only good if you have a young sibling and need a quick and simple game for their birthday party or something.

Pros: EZ to pick up and play, good party game, especially if it receives some updates further down the line
Cons: lack of stability, bugged lobby names, keys clipping into very hard to reach places if you miss a throw (forcing a restart) but again, this appears to be early access so of course it needs a lot of care at this point in time lol

author: {'steamid': '76561198040966715', 'num_games_owned': 2630, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1646946483}
review:
RUS Весьма странная поделка про магов, которые должны состязаться в закидывании ключа в магический портал. Используя телекинез мужики в пижамах и остроконечных шляпах кидаются предметами и забавно пинают друг друга. Увы, но радость быстро проходит. Сетевая игра не поддерживается, а remote play не в состоянии вытянуть более 2‑х человек. Возможностей мало, уровней мало и они очень тёмные. Кастомизация волшебников отсутствует. Если бы игра была бесплатна, то ещё можно было понять, но в текущем виде я не рекомендую тратить на неё деньги и время.

ENG A very strange game about magicians who must compete in throwing a key into a magical portal. Using telekinesis, men in pajamas and pointed hats throw objects and kick each other in a funny way. Alas, the joy passes quickly. Network play is not supported, and remote play is not able to draw more than 2 people. There are few opportunities, few levels and they are very dark. There is no wizard customization. If the game was free, then you could still understand, but in its current form, I do not recommend spending money and time on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284221076', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1645510088}
review:
El juego sería padre. El problema es que es un juego multijugador y el juego está muerto. No hay con quién jugar. Intenté varias veces jugar con otros y nunca encontré a alguien. Así yo nunca podía jugar el juego. 

Me da pena porque creo que me gustaría el juego. Pero hasta que haya muchos más jugadores, el juego no vale para nada. Y lo peor es que creo que nunca habrá suficientes jugadores. El juego no le interesa a la mayoría de la gente. Por eso, no recomiendo Wizard Bros.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081371715', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1617418062}
review: There's lots to be worked on still, and there isn't a whole lot to the game yet, BUT I had an absolute blast playing this with my friends. It's some of the best fun I've had in a while, and if you're into mindlessly goofing around with your friends and laughing until you're crying, it's definitely more than worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203269774', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1616904280}
review: This, has been something... i never thought i could experience something so amazing that i would have the joy of my life and the sadness of my life. I love the wizard, from his hair to his dance moves, i don't know what it is about wizard powers but they get me going. and seeing him kick his bros, it was like my life hadn't started until now. thank you devs for this journey. i learned a lot about myself along the way. I found myself playing it over and over not even realizing that i had stopped and started again. this game has proven that i can go far in my life, that i will be someone someday, thank you devs for proving my mother wrong, just because i live in a basement, much like the wizard bros' dungeon, I will go far, and i will kick a bro or two along the way. i love you devs, youve showed me new life. i can finally breathe again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065795912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1612106389}
review: Искал игру чтобы позалипать с другом. Наткнулись на данный проект, не ждали ничего сверхъестественного, и пожалуй, именно поэтому были приятно удивлены. author: {'steamid': '76561198146043822', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1617306237}
review: Funny game:) I really liked the physics of the game, it's a pleasure to run! I didn't notice any bugs, it is well optimized. At first I was embarrassed by early access, but doubts were in vain. Looking forward to new levels and traps!

author: {'steamid': '76561198052011382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1612028579}
review:
First of all you need to play this with a friend (or foe ;) preferably local couch multiplayer (of course you can play it using Steams "Remote play together"). I would say it's more fun beating your friend locally though. So, this game is about trying to beat your Wizard Bro (which is your Wizard rival) in taking keys to the portal. First player bringing 3 keys to the portal win the round (and you move to the next level. It's around 5-10 levels in the game so far, but it's still in early access). 

How do you get the keys? Each key is in a ice block, so you need to grab a log, making sure it's still on fire when you throw it on the ice block. Then grab the key and run for the portal. Your opponent will try to do the same and here is where the fight starts. You can kick your opponent or throw stuff at him/her. You can only hold one thing at a time, so if you hold the key you can not pick up a log for throwing or even kick (because you kick and throw with the same button). 
The physics in the game is ragdoll-style and it can result in a lot of laughs. This is a fun game that has a lot of potential and I'm looking forward to play it more when new functions/levels are added. The control is good and to make it even better I would suggest adding ability to duck or maybe block.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310930538', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 1190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1612071809}
review:
[i][b]Best[/b] co-op game I've ever played!
The game is in early access, but there are no bugs in the game (did not notice).[/i]
[b]Pros:[/b][i]
[list][*]Beautiful 3d graphics of players
[*]Simple control
[*]Good physics of the player, which throws him in different directions[/list][/i]
[b]Minuses:[/b]
[list][*][i]You can't play without friends[/i][/list]
I advise people who have friends to play :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198127906451', 'num_games_owned': 2898, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1611998887}
review:
Cool cooperative game. The essence of the game: deliver keys to the portal. The key itself is in an ice cube, which we can melt with a torched log. In general, a very simple and understandable gameplay. Also in the game there is pleasant graphics, excellent musical accompaniment.
Although the game is in early access, I did not find problems in it. It would just be great if the developer added a single mode.
I definitely advise you if you have someone to play with!

author: {'steamid': '76561198130658181', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 241, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1611945669}
review: The game is of high quality, but I hope that the developers will add a single player mode. It will be a completely new experience, this game has huge potential.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056956364', 'num_games_owned': 2565, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1611933068}
review: A very funny game. I played together with my friend - an unforgettable experience. The gameplay is extremely well thought out, which leaves positive emotions. Therefore, if you are looking for something interesting, then this game is definitely worth your attention.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272374716', 'num_games_owned': 13029, 'num_reviews': 3562, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1611930612}
review:
You will need a friend or family member and two gamepads. You can play locally and fight each other (local multiplayer 1vs1).
Your job is to grab a log and set it on fire, to melt the ice, pick up the key and to deliver it to the portal.

The Ragdoll Physics give the game an oddball appeal. 
Seeing the characters hopping and running fall and do somersaults is really funny.

It’s still in Early Access, but it’s stable + with very simple controls and mechanics + it’s a good, cool and light-hearted couch co-op experience.
The gameplay is balanced as well, allowing players of all skill levels to enjoy themselves.
You’ll have a lot of fun with Wizard Bros.
